name: Quilt Thrall: The curse of Joan
name_original: Quilt Thrall: The curse of Joan
description:
This game is a submission for the GameJam Argentina Online #2.
Themes: Alchemy , love and use your enemy.

EN- 

For several days, we were trying to communicate with our brother Joan, he did not answer any letter and did not come to visit us as usual.

Days went by and nothing changed, so we decided to go visit him in his town and we discovered that because of a debt he could not pay, he had been cursed by a evil sorcerer.

To save it, we must get different types of ingredients to craft the healing potion. But it will not be as easy as it sounds, we must enter a dungeon and fight with different types of enemies to achieve it.

ES- 

Durante varios días, estuvimos intentando comunicarnos con nuestro hermano Joan, él no respondía ninguna carta y tampoco venía a visitarnos como era costumbre.

Pasaban los días y nada cambiaba, por lo que decidimos ir a visitarlo a su pueblo y descubrimos que a causa de una deuda que no había podido saldar, había sido hechizado por un vil brujo.

Para salvarlo, debemos conseguir distintos tipos de ingredientes para formar la poción curativa. Pero no será tan fácil como suena, debemos adentrarnos en una mazmorra y combatir con distintos tipos de enemigos para lograrlo.

CONTROLS 

W,A,S,D: Move.
Shift: Run.
E: Pick up items.
TAB: Checklist.
Shoot:  Left click.
